common_setup.title: Setup the entity
common_setup.description: Enter the GPIO data for the entity

data.name: Name
data.red_calibration: Calibrate red color intensity to equalize brightness (0-100%)
data.green_calibration: Calibrate green color intensity to equalize brightness (0-100%)
data.blue_calibration: Calibrate blue color intensity to equalize brightness (0-100%)
data.relay_time: relay time in seconds (pin on time)
data.edge_event_timeout: Event timeout in seconds (only for motion/vibration sensors)
data.rely_on_edge_events: Rely only on edge events (e.g. motion/vibration sensor)
data.frequency: The frequency of the PWM signal or 0/None
data.channel: The channel of the MCP chip (e.g. 0-7)
data.min_voltage: The minimum voltage of the analog sensor
data.min_value: The minimum value of the sensor corresponding to the minimum voltage
data.step_voltage: The voltage step of the analog sensor
data.step_value: The value step of the sensor corresponding to the voltage step
